alert.note: Alert for Marathon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 7:29PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Marathon County through 815 PM CDT... At 729 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles west of Wausau to 6 miles west of Rib Mountain to 7 miles west of Mosinee. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mosinee, Wausau, Rib Mountain, Weston and Bevent. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
